name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and mix in the grated cheeses and plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water, and immediately add to the pancetta.
Remove pan from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, creating a creamy sauce. Add pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and half the spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake chicken until slightly charred but not fully cooked.
In a pan, fry onions until soft, then add remaining spices and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes until thickened.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for 10-15 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread until golden and crisp.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture on toast.
Top with optional fried or poached eggs if desired.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and garnish with microgreens.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chili powder, and salt for 2 hours.
